title: Practice Challenge
description: Create a 3x3 grid where tiles can be dragged to reorder. ---
instructions: Create a 3x3 grid where tiles can be dragged to reorder. ---

hints.text: Read the instructions carefully and break down the problem into smaller steps.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to dart code.

commonMistakes.correction: Use exact case: main not Main, print not Print
